column1: REWE - Incorrect per diem calculate on DE location
column26:
Hello team,

Could you please check and adjust the per diem calucuate on DE location.
The per diem calculation for a same day business trip is incorrect.
Per diem is applied from 8 hours 01 minutes or more.

1st day trip (same day return trip)
Absences from 0 hours to exactly 8 hours -> no per diem are paid
Absence for more than 8 hours, i.e. from 8:01 hours -> payment of the €14.00 expenses
00:00h to 08:00h > No per diem
08:01h to 24:00h > 14,00EUR

Sample: ES13423861
[^13423861 Test Spesen.pdf]

!image-2023-06-07-12-53-47-031.png|width=539,height=287!

FYI.
Trip with overnight stay:
{color:#ff0000}*Everything should stay the same here. Please do not make any changes!!!*{color}
Arrival and departure day less than 14 hours -> expenses payment €7.00
Arrival and departure day from 14 hours -> expenses payment 14.00 €
Intermediate day (absence of more than 24 hours) -> €28.00

Best regards,
Customer Support

column1: Eutelsat - STOP AUTOMATIC EXPORT
column26:
Dear Team,

 

Please could you stop all export for Eutelsat locations?

 

It seems that the Expense exports sent to SFTP for SAP integration take into account travel lines already paid by BTA cards. These lines should not appear in the exports and are now creating duplicate payments to the employee in addition to the BTA payment. 

 

They ask to stop the export until they have verify all statements already exported and corrected from their side.

 

Locations impacted ALL FR-Eutelsat SA

!image-2023-05-31-19-07-05-088.png|width=406,height=171!

 

Thank you.

Cheers,

Sandra
column158:
sever: amadeus2
system: ama-fr-eutelsat
Location All FR Eutelsat SA

column1: Amadeus - not working on customelogic of "customSubActors.CustomScriptSubActor"
column26:
Hello team,

We receive incident the the not working on custome logic of "customSubActors.CustomScriptSubActor".

The "CA - Amadeus Canada" location has a limit validator for "Personal meals on trip".

However, if the user travels to the USA and claims in USD, they will receive a validation error even if they are below the limit.
The CA location has a USD limit set by code, but I don't think there is a code to check in USD at the "CA - Amadeus Canada" location.
Since there is no code to check USD, I think it checks the limit value with "CAD".

In CI-7867 and CI-8263, We requested a validation rule for a specific cost center, but for some reason I think the USD currency code was also deleted at the same time.

Could you please adjust it.

Sample ES : {{14248611}}
Amount: 73USD 
!image-2023-04-28-18-48-15-529.png|width=601,height=338!

Amount: 73USD
Country "Other" 
!image-2023-04-28-18-48-56-857.png|width=929,height=477!

CA - amadeus canada customlogic.properties.

column1: Endress Hauser - Wrong calculation of NetAmount & TaxAmount for company car in XML File
column26:
Hello team,

Customer reported issue the Wrong calculation of NetAmount & TaxAmount for company car in XML File causes 0,01 GBP balance.
I think that the there is an error of 0.01 GBP due to roundup twice (Tax and net amount).
Could you please adjust the custome logic.

PDF report

!image-2023-04-18-08-02-36-076.png|width=580,height=156!
XML file
!image-2023-04-18-08-07-19-522.png|width=554,height=304!

•    Amount *46,35* (is the gross amount and includes 20% tax rate) 
•    TaxAmount = 46,35 / (1 + 20%)  * 20% = 7,725 (  rounded up 7,73)
•    NetAmount = 46,35 - 7,73 = *38.62{color:#de350b} (should be 38,62 not 38,63 ?){color}*
•    Therefore NetAmount + TaxAmount = *{color:#de350b}46,36{color}* and that’s the problem

Engine
!image-2023-04-18-08-16-20-469.png|width=638,height=162!
Best
column212: 08/May/23 2:31 PM;ddykiert;created Bug for this issue: https://jira.ifao.net/browse/EXPENG-1192;;;

column1: lcc-smartbooking-ap - EMS error for "error.expense.reportPhaseErrorOccured"
column26:
Hello tam,

!image-2023-04-13-19-35-15-897.png|width=429,height=72!

We have that role you can access the EMS from the management tab.
In the EMS you open the "advanced system settings" block and add the following setting in the system properties:
engine.useEMS.active=true

Afterwards your system will use the EMS for calculations.

!image-2023-04-13-19-34-39-476.png!

Best regards,
Yutaka
column212:
08/May/23 2:14 AM;yutaka.yasumi;From CI-10238156
Thank you ;;;

column1: Endress Hauser - Incorect Credit postings record
column26:
Hello team,

{color:#ff0000}*Please deploy to a test location of prod first. we can deploy to production location after customer testing.*{color}

Could you please adjust the Credit postings record.

Meal restrictions do not apply as the location is foreign(Germany and Franch). But in the Credit posting record an unknown amount of 10 X 3 EUR is posted.
So, Credit posting total amount has 114,50 EUR and does not match Debit record. 

In this case, Credit posting total amount should be 84,50 EUR.

If the location is a foreign country, please adjust so that the amount exceeding the limit is not posted to Credit recorded.
!image-2023-04-13-15-03-33-012.png|width=615,height=360!

IT location custome logic as below
Meal receipts have the following limits set at Italia location.

Italy domestic:
Meal Breakfast : 3.5 EUR
Meal Lunch: 18 EUR
Meal Dinner: 33 EUR

foreign countries:
*No limit on Meal types*

column1: Allianz - Double Budgeting, pdf report remove line "Mahlzeitenversteuerung über die Gehaltsabrechnung"
column26:
Dear Team,

Currently for the configuration "Double Budgeting", when user travels by car and add the kilometers done, they have a "Payment of tax for meal via payroll" because after 20km done the amount change to 0,38€ instead 0,30€ per kilometer.

After verification, it appears that this difference is allowed by the German government and it's not taxable.

I did a test in staging and the line "Mahlzeitenversteuerung über die Gehaltsabrechnung" (Payment of tax for meal via payroll) is not sent in the export (see attached)

So I assume that it's only shown in the pdf report.

Please could you remove it ?

Thanks for your help.

Best regards,

Sandra

column212:
21/Feb/23 10:00 AM;nsanchezruiz;client notes>

For clarification:

1) If the company pays the costs, then it must be mapped to a wage type starting with 9.

In this example, the company pays for the flight. This means that the correct wage type is 961Z. There are no alternatives with regard to sales tax.

2) If the employee pays the costs, then a wage type starting with 8 must be mapped.

Only here is the wage type selected according to the amount of sales tax.;;;

example:

 

2 Feb. with overnight stay 619
3 Feb without overnight stay 621
The trip is a 2-day trip with one overnight stay, so the first day is a per diem with overnight stay (619) and the return day is a per diem without overnight stay (621). 

It must be taken into account that with overnight stay it has to be until 0:00 or full day and,  Without overnight stay until 23:55;;;

column1: ProcuRX-Jifiti - Invalid target currency of exchange rate
column26:
Could you please adjust the "expense.currency"
h2. current issue:

Customer get the error for "{*}Invalid target currency of exchange rate"{*}
I found the past same EMS issue case. ITE-882/CI-7777

The "home currency" is always determined by

1) the currency in the TMS of the location of the user (see screenshot below) 
2) the currency in the EMS/Engine configuration from the statutory properties settings (Could not check cause of missing Access/EMS Superadmin role)

If 1) and 2) mismatch usually the observed error is shown.

!image-2022-12-27-14-46-16-611.png!

Example:
#10109325 Created 17NOV22 22:21
user: *nick.kappler@jifiti.com*
*location: JIFITI USA, Columbus*

column1: EH:increase custom script size limitation/ITE-1475
column26:
dear team as per ITE-1475 please :
code into the custom script a size limitation, for warning messages

ref:

+*ssue as reported:*+

Generic error on a specific statement during calculate action

+*Labels:*+

SAExp:iConf - the statement is inoperable by invalid configuration

+*Root Cause:*+

Multiple warning fields are stored in this statement wit too-large-content. This specifc case resembles ITE-1178. A field non-existing in ce-core is returned by the engine. Thus it is stored as Link. Links have a size limit in the Database smaller than the content:

!_SA_NG Error_Link too long.png|thumbnail!

Above the corresponding NG error.

Here is the Engine calculation response: [^13181003_response.xml]

In short - the calculate is functioning, but ce-core is not able to store the result, cause the result contains too many characters for the link.

The issue is caused by changing the configuration of the warnings FDF retrospectively during the lifetime of this statement.
column212:
27/Dec/22 10:49 AM;nsanchezruiz;client:

hank you for your feedback. This is really strange and unfortunately I don't know exactly what you mean. 
Regarding the warning field, we already had 2 or more tickets in the past and also had the character limit of this field changed from 240 characters to 1500 characters. ( for e.g. 2-16673277933 or 2-16382386753) I have now informed the affected user that this expense statement is unfortunately broken and can not be repaired. He will create the expense statement completely new and deletes the broken one. 
I hope that in the future similar cases due to the same backgrounds do not occur again. This is depending on the enormous effort for the user. ;;;

column1: AUDI - Wrong statements calculation
column26:
Dear Team,

Following the ITE-1289, it seems that the reimbursment amount is not properly calculated.

e.g.: 7799370

 

!image-2022-12-13-15-13-04-812.png|width=404,height=154!

 

+Must be:+

'Sachbezugswerte ...': 10,71 -> this amount is informational only and is not used for calculation

'Summe ...': 87,14 -> is the sum of all receipts - paid by company and paid by Traveler

'Zwischensumme': 87,14 -> is the sum of everything above (mileage, accommodation, receipts) but without the part 'Sachbezugswerte ...'

Abzüglich ...': 7,14 -> is minus the receipts paid by company

'Erstattungsberag...' 80,00 -> the reimbursment amount

 

Please could you verify and fix?

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra

column1: der-co-init - Correct the calculation of the §4(5) EStG 30% amount
column26:
Dear Team,

Der-co-init complains that the calculation of the calculation of the §4(5) EStG 30% amount is wrong because it doesn't include the TIP.

 

In the example below you can see that only the entertainment is splitted into 70/30.

100 EUR - 15,97 EUR (tax) = 84,03 EUR

84,03 EUR x 30 % = 25,21 EUR

!image-2022-10-25-16-46-26-667.png!

Please could you fix?

This customer has already EMS, I don't know if it's something that could be fix in EMS but if it's the case, please explain the steps to correct and like this BAYANI Team will do it in the future.

 

Thank you.

Best regards,

Sandra
